hours_text:
## museum Admission

Your ticket directly supports the Speed’s mission, helping us bring world-class exhibitions, dynamic programs, and educational initiatives to our community. Your visit sustains the museum as a space for inspiration, connection, and lifelong learning. Thank you!

**Admission to the Speed Art Museum includes access to:**

  * Our permanent collection galleries
  * Exhibitions and installations
  * Select activities and programs
  * Art Sparks, our interactive, hands-on learning gallery for all ages

Tickets also are available at the door or by calling 502.634.2700

[gET TICKETS](http://web.archive.org/web/20251227194821/https://9620.blackbaudhosting.com/9620/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=a2b4ef0b-69a6-429b-af21-5ee24b92ace4)

**Pricing**  
Members Free – [Become a member!](http://web.archive.org/web/20251227194821/https://9620.blackbaudhosting.com/9620/General-Membership)  
**Adult (18-59):** $25.00  
**Child (4-17):** $21.00  
**Senior (60+):** $23.00

Certain events and programs, and Speed Cinema screenings are not included in general admission and require separate ticketing. Last tickets are sold one hour prior to closing, and guests are not permitted to stay past closing time.****

**Our Art Park is open!**  
This free, ungated art-meets-nature experience will be open from dawn until dusk. 

Upcoming Museum closure – December 25, 2025

admission_text:
# Step inside. Be inspired.

Kentucky’s oldest and largest art museum, the Speed is a vibrant space for community, discovery, and boundary-pushing art.

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251227194821/https://9620.blackbaudhosting.com/9620/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=a2b4ef0b-69a6-429b-af21-5ee24b92ace4)

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

# Accessibility

## Accessibility & Belonging

At the Speed, our mission is to invite everyone to celebrate art forever. An important part of inviting everyone is making sure that the Museum is a space in which all members of our community feel welcome and safe. Explore this page to learn more about the Speed’s commitment to accessibility and belonging. As a public institution, we are always learning how to best serve those in our community, with the understanding that the work involved in changing and growing is never finished.

The Speed Art Museum commits to fostering a culture of belonging and access for all persons, regardless of ethnicity, race, color, national origin, age, different abilities, religion, marital or parental status, political affiliations or beliefs, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, or socioeconomic status.
collections_text:
# Welcome

Your Speed is more than a museum—it’s a place to connect, reflect, and be transformed. Through bold storytelling, immersive experiences, and a world-spanning collection, we spark curiosity, foster well-being, and bring people together.

[Plan Your Visit](/web/20260115041120/https://www.speedmuseum.org/visit/)

# Welcome

Your Speed is more than a museum—it’s a place to connect, reflect, and be transformed. Through bold storytelling, immersive experiences, and a world-spanning collection, we spark curiosity, foster well-being, and bring people together.

[Plan Your Visit](/web/20260115041120/https://www.speedmuseum.org/visit/)

Your Speed is more than a museum—it’s a place to connect, reflect, and be transformed. Through bold storytelling, immersive experiences, and a world-spanning collection, we spark curiosity, foster well-being, and bring people together.
